channel.title: 显卡 on Banbu1118's Blog

item.title: Vgpu Licserver
item.description: vgpu授权服务器搭建方案 法律声明 此方案仅供测试使用，如有侵权行为，请联系我删除，本人不承担任何法律责任 方案来源 #本文章采用docker方案部署，其他部署请查看以下链接， https://github.com/GreenDamTan/fastapi-dls 生成ssl证书 WORKING_DIR=/opt/docker/fastapi-dls/cert mkdir -p $WORKING_DIR cd $WORKING_DIR # create instance private and public key for singing JWT's openssl genrsa -out $WORKING_DIR/instance.private.pem 2048 openssl rsa -in $WORKING_DIR/instance.private.pem -outform PEM -pubout -out $WORKING_DIR/instance.public.pem # create ssl certificate for integrated webserver (uvicorn) - because clients rely on ssl openssl req -x509
